## transform package

A utility library for creating [NodeJS streams](https://nodejs.org/dist/latest-v14.x/docs/api/stream.html#stream_simplified_construction)

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [transform(transformer, flusher)](./transform.transform.md) | An alternative, simplified construction for creating [Transform streams](https://nodejs.org/dist/latest-v14.x/docs/api/stream.html#stream_duplex_and_transform_streams) May also use NodeJS [simplified construction](https://nodejs.org/dist/latest-v14.x/docs/api/stream.html#stream_simplified_construction) |
